title: Portfolio Website
description: A modern, high-performance developer portfolio showcasing full-stack projects and UI/UX work. Built using React 19 and TailwindCSS, with Three.js and Framer Motion integrated for immersive 3D visuals and smooth animations. Features include SEO optimization, fully responsive layouts and fast load times.

title: HiRevo :- AI Interviewer Platform
description: An AI-powered interview platform that simulates real technical interviews using NLP and LLM-based evaluation. Includes role-based authentication, dynamic question generation, answer analysis, real-time scoring, and detailed interview feedback. Designed to help students and professionals practice interviews with an interactive and intelligent system.

title: PathAI :â€“ AI-Powered Career Coach Platform
description: An AI-driven career guidance platform that analyzes market trends and recommends the best career paths for users based on current industry demand. Allows users to generate professional resumes, take MCQ-based skill assessments, and receive personalized role insights powered by Gemini AI. Built with a scalable architecture using Next.js, Prisma ORM, NeonDB, and Clerk authentication.
